name: illlustrations
description:
Insert all 120+ illustrations from the illustrations.co open-source library, directly in your Figma and FigJam files as SVG/Vector.


Features:

  • Insert illustration as SVG / Vector
  • You can search by any related keyboard
  • Because it's SVG you can change shape and color anytime
  • Work with both Figma and FigJam


Feedback:

I'd love to know what you made using illlustrations. Feel free to tag me or say hi on Twitter (@realvjy). You are also welcome to share your feedback or bug reports üôè


Support:

The goal of this project is to contribute to the open design community. Even though I do not intend to charge for these community resources, if illlustrations has ever been useful to you or your team, I would appreciate your support! It helps to maintain server costs and keep it grow. More details about the project illlustrations.co

----

Plugin is opensource: https://github.com/realvjy/illlustrations-figma

You are welcome to contribute


Website: illlustrations.co

Twitter: _illlustrations
